sections.heading: What are cookies?
sections.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device to help the site remember your preferences, improve performance, and analyze navigation.

sections.heading: What types do we use?
sections.content:
- Essential cookies: necessary for the functioning of the site.
- Analytics cookies: to understand how the site is used.
- Third-party cookies: such as Google Analytics or external services.

sections.heading: How can you control them?
sections.content: You can configure your browser to accept, reject, or delete cookies. You can also change your consent at any time from the cookie banner.

sections.heading: Contact
sections.content: If you have any questions about our cookies policy, write to us at contact@dripnex.app.
